title: EduVR: A Virtual Reality Tool for Intuitive Statistical Education on Machine Learning Algorithms
conference: 9th International Conference on ICT for Sustainable Development (ICT4SD),  Goa, India
description: Co-authored a research paper, presented at the conference and selected for publication in Springer Nature.
Identified that existing Virtual Reality (VR) tools capture only the end result of different Machine Learning algorithms fed with static input data.

Pursued courses on Unity and C# to build a VR tool that enables users to input datasets, select fields to visualize, simulate and interact with the 3D visualization generated through each step of the algorithm.
Utilized this tool to interactively teach students in ML workshops at the IT Department Coding Club.

title: AI-Driven Summarization of Academic Literature using Transformer Model
conference: 2nd International Conference on Inventive Computing and Informatics (ICICI), India
description: Co-authored a research paper, presented at the conference, and selected for publication in IEEE Xplore.
Identified through literature review that ML generated summaries of academic papers omit key details.
Researched a combination of NLP techniques and Transformers to extract key details and summarize papers.
